author: David Baca
comment: I installed it but can't use it. The app tells me I need to register but every time I enter my details the app responds with "Error Message Invalid profile entry". Can anyone help me please? I just discovered this app and wanted to use it this morning but it doesn't seem like that is going to happen. I checked website for help or a FAQ but found neither. Very disappointed because it looked good.

author: Ryan Joe
comment: Doesn't capture any data from my swing even though I have now used up all my games available and I can't even log a bug report (says preparing report and will notify me once ready but never notifies me)

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Ryan, please mail us on slamdunq.mail@gmail.com we will get back to you on the issue.

title: Doesn't work

author: Bhrigu Raj Sood
comment: Can't use the app without login and the sign up process is not working. The servers not responding error message. Wastage of time.

author: MyKcuL
comment: Utter garbage! Doesn't even let you log in. Can't register, just doesn't do anything. If you're going to release an app, top tip.... Make sure it works!

author: Kevin Goatz-Short
comment: So much hope and potential is what I had for this app but as it goes with most of the free apps you can find it doesn't quite work I have a Samsung S7 and the Gear Fit 2 only will tell me I have improper swing did not get full action who knows

author: Jacob Madden
comment: Used to work great, but like others have reported I can no longer login. No error message, just eventually times out.

author: Michael kj Bullock
comment: I have been looking for some advice on how to improve my game and this is has all the conservative feedback I could possibly get.   Very good

author: Ian Manton
comment: Experimental swing detection didn't work,  manual did, htc 10 and huawei watch sport 2. uncertain how good it is at measuring though as free swings way too limited and cost to buy more is too excessive.  Id try 1000 swings at 50p but not 10k at a fiver.  Also cost for games too high.

author: Karim Zerrad
comment: great app. working just fine with my gear S3 / galaxy S8. it is not getting 5* because we can't see every single shot stats on the sceen right after the swing. you have to go ding into it. great app nonetheless

author: Andy M
comment: Much better free apps out there for scorecards and gps. Swing analysis is a joke compared to skypro. Uninstalled

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Andy, We are sorry to see you go. Skypro as we understands requires for you to buy a device. Ours uses the smartwatch to do the swing analysis. Do write to us at slamdunq.mail@gmail.com we would love to improve and be back on your phone again!

author: Brian McLean
comment: I have installed the app on my phone and my fitbit2 . But everytime i try to sign up it just keep going around trying to go to next part i have try 6 times now i have uninstalled then re installed and the same thing goes on and on.

author: Malakai5347
comment: Using it on Samsung gear fit pro 2, does not work. Maybe an upgrade on the app is required to accommodate. Like the concept. Would love it if it was functional.

author: Johan Godfried
comment: The number of recorded swings on the driving range with my gear s2 is abysmal. Only 30 out of 200 are recorded. Bought 10k swings but st this rate it will last a long long time

author: Odette Victor
comment: Would be nice if it worked! No swing feedback on my phone, using Samsung gear fit 2.

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Odette, mail us a diagnostic report on slamdunq.mail@gmail.com we would love to make it work for you!

author: Alexаnder X
comment: I installed the app 5 minutes ago and have already been asked twice to rate it. Bad UX. And I don't want to enable the auto-swing so why do you constantly asking that? BTW, the app saved only one swing while I recorded 5

author: Tanzeel Ahmed
comment: Don't work whenever I try to open the app it closes down by itself, this is just annoying I downloaded the cricket app and that won't work as well and they aren't replying, it's not worth it

author: Simon Plane
comment: Unlike most reviews on here i found the app works well with the samsung s7 and gear fit 2 i need to spend more time with it to really find how accurate it is but so far quite impressed .. only thing i would prefer to see is an option for a paid app without ads and not having to buy swings in bulk . Could this be an option for the future ?

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the review Simon. We will take your feedback and work on it.

author: David Harris
comment: It will not connect with my gear fit 2 watch. It did before but now it has a line thru the watch  This is the 2nd time I have tried this App.. Minus 5 stars

author: Garry Aynbinder
comment: Using this app with Apple watch and iPhone... Keep getting swing errors... Emailed developer and they said update will fix... Bunch of bs.. Do not buy

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Garry, we wrote back to you from our support id and gave you a solution as well. Request you to please check.

author: Geraldine Yan
comment: Doesn't even load up to start a swing. Keeps giving me instructions on how to tap on watch but doesn't start.

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Geraldine, those are the instruction screens. the analysis starts once you start the app on the watch. Please write to us on slamdunq.mail@gmail.com for further queries.

title: Swing analysis doesn't work

author: Christopher Ortiz
comment: Samsung Galaxy s7... gear 2 Swatch.  Everything paired and no matter how many swings, no data.

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Christopher. Please send us a mail on slamdunq.mail@gmail.com we will get back to you on the issue

title: Does not work!

author: Jason O'Regan
comment: Very poor and when you try and seek help with the app no one response

author: Anneline Stein
comment: Been struggling to register for 2 months...send emails with no response

author: Jeffrey Bergamotto
comment: Cannot get passed login screen.  Hangs on trying to create a login.

author: Deptroy T
comment: I would prefer buying the app and having an unlimited amount of swings and games.

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Thanks Deptroy. We will look into an option where you can buy unlimited games/swings.

title: Great app.

author: Michael Weber
comment: App doesn't work. Will not let me sign in to use.

author: Marcus Coetzee
comment: First it doesnt want to read my swing. Doesnt want to load clubs. Reinstalled and now will not log in????

author: Chris McInally
comment: Can't use without log in and doesn't let you create a new accountc

author: Dave Myers
comment: Won't connect to my Gear S2. Emailed the developer and he doesn't respond.

author: Bennett Walker
comment: Login never registers as a result can't use the app

author: Andre Rosslee
comment: Does not connect to my gear s2

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content:
Hi andre,
Please write to us on slamdunq.mail@gmail.com. We will have a look

author: Joe Cozzuol
comment: The app never let me login.

author: Michael Chong
comment: Cant use it. Cant even sign up.

author: Lavon Perrin
comment: Doesn't work

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Lavon. Please do write to slamdunq.mail@gmail.com with your specific problem and we would try and resolve it for you.

author: Donald Yeung
comment: Can't sign up, can't login, can't use it

author: Will Anaya
comment: Great app. Taught me a lot

author: Wasan Prempunpong
comment: It's good program

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Thanks Wasan! Glad you like it

author: Ted Yau
comment: Very good app

author: Gordon Reihl
comment: I got this app for my Gear Fit, and never worked.. Just opened and the closed, worthless

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content:
Hi Gordon,
We are compatible with a Gear Fit 2 and not with Gear Fit. In case you are using a Gearfit 2 and facing this problem, please send us a diagnostic report and we will look into the issue.

title: Don't work

author: Nick Bova
comment: All recordings were the exact same. Same results with a friend wearing my watch.  Can you delete the data. It doesn't change clubs when selected.

reply.author: SlamdunQ
reply.content: Hi Nick, Can you capture a swing and then do a report issue so that we can analyse the issue that you have been facing.
